subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Martin was a member of the Buffalo Sabres’ celebrated French Connection in the 1970s, and is the team’s career leader in hat tricks, scoring three or more goals in a game 21 times.
snippet: Mr. Martin was a member of the Buffalo Sabres’ celebrated French Connection in the 1970s, and is the team’s career leader in hat tricks, scoring three or more goals in a game 21 times.
